alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Cherokee; Cobb; Dawson; Forsyth; Fulton; Lumpkin; Paulding; Pickens (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 29 at 11:08PM EST until December 30 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Paulding County in northwestern Georgia... Cherokee County in north central Georgia... Forsyth County in north central Georgia... Northern Cobb County in north central Georgia... Southwestern Lumpkin County in north central Georgia... Dawson County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Fulton County in north central Georgia... Pickens County in north central Georgia... Southeastern Bartow County in northwestern Georgia... * Until midnight EST. * At 1108 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Salacoa Valley to Waleska to Little River Landing to Emerson to near Braswell, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marietta, Canton, Cartersville, Cumming, Jasper, Dawsonville, Sandy Springs, Roswell, Johns Creek, Alpharetta, Milton, Kennesaw, Woodstock, Acworth, Sugar Hill, Holly Springs, Emerson, Ball Ground, Nelson and Waleska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.

area.areaDesc: Bartow; Cherokee; Cobb; Dawson; Forsyth; Fulton; Lumpkin; Paulding; Pickens
